public class UIComboChart
extends UIChartBase

Defines properties for a combo chart.

getAnimationIndicators

public final java.lang.String getAnimationIndicators()
Returns the type of data change animation indicators. Valid values are "all" (default) and "none".

setAnimationIndicators

public final void setAnimationIndicators(java.lang.String type)
Specifies the type of data change animation indicators. Valid values are "all" (default) and "none".

getBarGapRatio

public final java.lang.Number getBarGapRatio()
Returns the gaps between bar groups as a ratio of the total width allocated to each group.

setBarGapRatio

public final void setBarGapRatio(java.lang.Number value)
Specifies the gaps between bar groups as a ratio of the total width allocated to each group.

getCoordinateSystem

public final java.lang.String getCoordinateSystem()
Returns the coordinate system of the chart. Valid values are: cartesian (default), polar.

setCoordinateSystem

public final void setCoordinateSystem(java.lang.String type)
Specifies the coordinate system of the chart. Valid values are: cartesian (default), polar.

getDataCursor

public final java.lang.String getDataCursor()
Returns whether the data cursor is enabled. Valid values are: "auto" (default), "off", and "on". For "auto", the data cursor is enabled only for area and line charts on touch devices.

setDataCursor

public final void setDataCursor(java.lang.String type)
Specifies whether the data cursor is enabled. Valid values are: "auto" (default), "off", and "on". For "auto", the data cursor is enabled only for area and line charts on touch devices.

getDataCursorBehavior

public final java.lang.String getDataCursorBehavior()
Returns the data cursor interaction behavior. Valid values are: "auto" (default), "smooth", and "snap". For "auto", the data cursor moves smoothly for line and area charts, and snaps for other chart types.

setDataCursorBehavior

public final void setDataCursorBehavior(java.lang.String type)
Specifies the data cursor interaction behavior. Valid values are: "auto" (default), "smooth", and "snap". For "auto", the data cursor moves smoothly for line and area charts, and snaps for other chart types.

getMaximumBarWidth

public final java.lang.Number getMaximumBarWidth()
Returns the maximum width of each bar in pixels.

setMaximumBarWidth

public final void setMaximumBarWidth(java.lang.Number value)
Specifies the maximum width of each bar in pixels.

getOrientation

public final java.lang.String getOrientation()
Returns the orientation of the chart. Valid values are: vertical (default), horizontal.

setOrientation

public final void setOrientation(java.lang.String type)
Specifies the orientation of the chart. Valid values are: vertical (default), horizontal.

getPolarGridShape

public final java.lang.String getPolarGridShape()
Returns the grid shape of a chart with polar coordinate system. Does not apply when bar series are displayed. Valid values are: circle (default), polygon.

setPolarGridShape

public final void setPolarGridShape(java.lang.String type)
Specifies the grid shape of a chart with polar coordinate system. Does not apply when bar series are displayed. Valid values are: circle (default), polygon.

getStack

public final java.lang.String getStack()
Returns whether the data should be stacked. Valid values are: "off" (default) and "on".

setStack

public final void setStack(java.lang.String type)
Specifies whether the data should be stacked. Valid values are: "off" (default) and "on".

getTimeAxisType

public final java.lang.String getTimeAxisType()
Returns the time axis type for the chart. Valid values are: "disabled" (default), "enabled", and "mixedFrequency".

setTimeAxisType

public final void setTimeAxisType(java.lang.String type)
Specifies the time axis type for the chart. Valid values are: "disabled" (default), "enabled", and "mixedFrequency".

getZoomAndScroll

public final java.lang.String getZoomAndScroll()
Returns the zoom and scroll type for the chart. Valid values are: "off" (default), "delayedScrollOnly", "liveScrollOnly", "delayed", and "live".

setZoomAndScroll

public final void setZoomAndScroll(java.lang.String type)
Specifies the zoom and scroll type for the chart. Valid values are: "off" (default), "delayedScrollOnly", "liveScrollOnly", "delayed", and "live".
